content:
Dear all,
I would like to share with you some results obtained by my team in DNN (Deep Neural Networks) simplification for Deep Learning execution on-board.

Agenium Space has obtained very good results in DNN simplification for several use-cases implemented for Sentinel images (Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2). Would you like to know more about the results of CORTEX project funded by ESA, EO SCIENCE FOR SOCIETY PERMANENTLY OPEN CALL FOR PROPOSALS EOEP-5 BLOCK 4, and our research on network simplification for Deep Learning on the edge? See https://esacortexproject.agenium-space.com/
Thanks to Bertrand Le Saux and European Space Agency - ESA Î¦-lab for their support to this work.

Do not hesitate to contact me if you are interested by having more details or discuss about that.

Have a very happy holiday season!

Best regards,

Rosa Ruiloba

Cortex Project - Agenium Space
Deep Learning simplification for on-board processing
